Work About CV

When I'm not designing I like to ride motorcycles

From Porto Alegre Brazil, studied Marketing and Communication for 3 years before move to Lisbon and graduate in Advertising and Marketing at Institute of Arts and Design of Lisbon on 2016.

Over 10+ years of my career, my portfolio includes User Interface & Experience Design for Websites and Mobile Applications, Ad Campaings, TV Ads, Video Editing and Graphic Design. Currently I'm improving my skills and gaining new ones in UX Design.

During my career, I have taught myself to code in front-end languages. This allows me to put my product vision in place exactly as I've visualised. Generally I know the possibilities and restrictions of user interfaces and I know how to co-operate with teams.
